title: 服务器一直发出这样的MySQL警告
author: 43729417@qq.com
txt_content:
安装了有全球商店和Point点券(连接了mysql数据库)
服务器只要有玩家在线就一直刷屏这个警告
全部玩家退出后就正常了.没刷屏了
[10:07:46 WARN]: Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsExcept
ion: The last packet successfully received from the server was 234,686,226 milli
seconds ago.  The last packet sent successfully to the server was 234,686,234 mi
lliseconds ago. is longer than the server configured value of 'wait_timeout'. Yo
u should consider either expiring and/or testing connection validity before use
in your application, increasing the server configured values for client timeouts
, or using the Connector/J connection property 'autoReconnect=true' to avoid thi
s problem.

replies.author: 我是dalao
replies.txt_content: 连接数据库超时，将配置中autoreconnect=false改为true
